medicine
Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
  medicine.Medicine

public class Medicine
extends java.lang.Object

This java bean Medicine provides the necessary accessor and mutator methods to access the Medicine Object and provides instance methods to perform CRUD functions on the database schema

macpro
